entry.string: The Hitcount module is a simple utility module to count the number of hits on an item.
entry.translation: Zee Heetcuoont mudoole-a is a seemple-a uteelity mudoole-a tu cuoont zee noomber ooff heets oon un item.

entry.string: It is currently responsible for accomplishing these tasks:
entry.translation: It is coorrently respunseeble-a fur eccumpleeshing zeese-a tesks:

entry.string: Collects and displays hit detail on items in Xaraya.
entry.translation: Cullects und deespleys heet deteeel oon items in Xereya.

entry.string: Simply set the configuration as you would like, and the hitcount module will begin collecting data on the hooks that you configure.
entry.translation: Seemply set zee cunffeegooreshun es yuoo vuoold leeke-a, und zee heetcuoont mudoole-a veell begeen cullecteeng deta oon zee huuks thet yuoo cunffeegoore-a.

entry.string: The hitcount must be hooked into the items that you want to count up.
entry.translation: Zee heetcuoont moost be-a huuked intu zee items thet yuoo vunt tu cuoont up.
